thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 08 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-CSS Industries Reports Q3 Earnings Per Share $0.65

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-CSS Industries Reports Q3 Earnings Per Share $0.65
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - CSS Industries Inc:
* CSS INDUSTRIES REPORTS FISCAL 2018 THIRD QUARTER RESULTS * Q3 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.52 * Q3 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.65 * Q3 SALES $130.6 MILLION VERSUS $117.2 MILLION * ‍NET SALES ARE NOW EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $356 MILLION TO $362 MILLION FOR FY18​
* ‍COMPANY EXPECTS TO GENERATE A FULL YEAR NET LOSS OF $9.1 MILLION TO $11.3 MILLION​
* CO‘S FY18 NET INCOME WILL BE ADVERSELY IMPACTED BY STEP-UP TO FAIR VALUE OF INVENTORY ACQUIRED AS PART OF SIMPLICITY ACQUISITION​
* ‍ADJUSTED EBITDA FOR FISCAL 2018 IS NOW EXPECTED TO BE IN RANGE OF $23 MILLION TO $26 MILLION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
